data.actual_result: Discord doesn't show a dropdown with users (only happens on some servers, eg, doesn't work on a server that I just created, but works on ddevs)
data.expected_result: Discord shows a dropdown with users
data.short_description: Search doesn't show user recommendation dropdown on some servers until you start typing
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on search and then click on from: or mentions:
